post.description:
This endpoint is restricted to administrators. Creates a new category with the specified name.
            
**Validation Rules:**
- **Name**: Required, 2-100 characters (trimmed), case-insensitive uniqueness check
            
**Possible Error Responses:**
            
**400 Bad Request** - Validation error with field-level details:
```json
{
  "status": 400,
  "type": "https://httpstatuses.io/400/validation-error",
  "title": "Validation error",
  "detail": "One or more validation errors occurred.",
  "instance": "/api/admin/categories",
  "correlationId": "abc123",
  "errors": {
    "Name": ["Category name must be at least 2 characters"]
  }
}
```
            
**409 Conflict** - Category name already exists (case-insensitive):
```json
{
  "status": 409,
  "type": "https://httpstatuses.io/409/conflict",
  "title": "Conflict",
  "detail": "Category with name 'Productivity' already exists",
  "instance": "/api/admin/categories",
  "correlationId": "def456"
}
```
            
**500 Internal Server Error** - Unexpected server error:
```json
{
  "status": 500,
  "type": "https://httpstatuses.io/500/infrastructure-error",
  "title": "Infrastructure error",
  "detail": "An unexpected error occurred while processing your request.",
  "instance": "/api/admin/categories",
  "correlationId": "ghi789"
}
```
            
All error responses include a `correlationId` for tracing and follow RFC 7807 Problem Details format.

requestBody.description: The create category request containing the category name.

This endpoint is restricted to administrators. Creates a new tip with structured content
including title, description, steps, category, tags, optional video URL, and optional image.

requestBody.description: The create tip request containing tip details.

put.description:
This endpoint is restricted to administrators. Updates the tip with the specified ID.
All fields (title, description, steps, category, tags, video URL) can be updated.
            
**Validation Rules:**
- **Title**: Required, 5-200 characters (trimmed)
- **Description**: Required, 10-2000 characters (trimmed)
- **Steps**: Required, at least one step
  - Step Number: Must be >= 1
  - Step Description: Required, 10-500 characters (trimmed)
- **CategoryId**: Required, must exist and not be soft-deleted
- **Tags**: Optional, maximum 10 tags
  - Each tag: 1-50 characters (trimmed)
- **VideoUrl**: Optional, must be valid URL from supported platforms
  - YouTube Watch: `https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=*`
  - YouTube Shorts: `https://www.youtube.com/shorts/*`
  - Instagram: `https://www.instagram.com/p/*`
            
**Possible Error Responses:**
            
**400 Bad Request** - Validation error with field-level details:
```json
{
  "status": 400,
  "type": "https://httpstatuses.io/400/validation-error",
  "title": "Validation error",
  "detail": "One or more validation errors occurred.",
  "instance": "/api/admin/tips/{id}",
  "correlationId": "abc123",
  "errors": {
    "Description": ["Tip description must be at least 10 characters"]
  }
}
```
            
**404 Not Found** - Tip does not exist:
```json
{
  "status": 404,
  "type": "https://httpstatuses.io/404/resource-not-found",
  "title": "Resource not found",
  "detail": "Tip with id '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' was not found.",
  "instance": "/api/admin/tips/123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000",
  "correlationId": "def456"
}
```

  "detail": "Category with id '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' was not found.",

get.summary: Retrieves a specific category by its unique identifier.
get.description:
This endpoint is publicly accessible and does not require authentication.
Returns 404 Not Found if the category does not exist or has been deleted.
Returns 400 Bad Request if the provided ID is not a valid GUID format.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the category.

get.summary: Retrieves tips belonging to a specific category with pagination and sorting support.
get.description:
This endpoint is publicly accessible and does not require authentication.
It supports pagination and sorting for browsing tips within a specific category.
Returns 404 Not Found if the category does not exist.
Returns 200 OK with an empty array if the category exists but has no tips.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the category.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Field to sort by (CreatedAt, UpdatedAt, Title).

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Sort direction (Ascending or Descending).

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (starts at 1).

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page.

get.summary: Retrieves the current authenticated user's list of favorite tips.
get.description:
Returns a paginated list of the user's favorites with full tip details. The user is
resolved from the external authentication identifier (for example, the Firebase UID in
the JWT `sub` claim). Supports filtering by category, searching by term, sorting,
and pagination via query parameters.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Optional search term to filter favorites by tip title or description.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: Optional category ID to filter favorites by category.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Optional list of tags to filter favorites.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort field (Title, CreatedAt, UpdatedAt). Defaults to CreatedAt.

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Sort direction (Ascending, Descending). Defaults to Descending.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number (minimum 1). Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size (1-100). Defaults to 10.

post.summary: Adds a tip to the current authenticated user's favorites.
post.description:
Adds the specified tip to the user's favorites collection. The user is resolved from the
external authentication identifier (for example, the Firebase UID in the JWT `sub` claim).
Returns 201 Created with the favorite details on success. Returns 409 Conflict if the tip
is already in the user's favorites. Returns 404 Not Found if the tip does not exist.
Emits security events for both success and failure cases for audit logging.

parameters.name: tipId
parameters.description: The ID of the tip to add to favorites.

delete.summary: Removes a tip from the current authenticated user's favorites.
delete.description:
Removes the specified tip from the user's favorites collection. The user is resolved from the
external authentication identifier (for example, the Firebase UID in the JWT `sub` claim).
Returns 204 No Content on success. Returns 404 Not Found if the tip is not in the user's favorites.
Emits security events for both success and failure cases for audit logging.

parameters.name: tipId
parameters.description: The ID of the tip to remove from favorites.

post.summary: Merges client-stored anonymous favorites into the authenticated user's server-side favorites.
post.description:
Accepts a list of tip IDs from client local storage and merges them into the user's
server-side favorites. The operation performs validation, deduplication, and returns
a detailed summary of the merge results including counts of added, skipped, and failed tips.

The merge operation is idempotent - calling it multiple times with the same tip IDs
produces the same result. Existing favorites are never removed, only new ones are added.

Invalid or non-existent tip IDs are reported in the failed list but do not prevent
valid tips from being added (partial success).

requestBody.description: The merge request containing a list of tip IDs from client local storage.

parameters.name: pageNumber

It returns comprehensive tip information suitable for display to end users.

parameters.name: id

post.summary: Creates a new user record for the current authenticated identity.
post.description:
This endpoint is typically called once after a user has authenticated with the external
identity provider (for example, Firebase). The external authentication identifier is
derived exclusively from the caller's access token (for example, the JWT `sub`
claim) and is not accepted from the request body.

get.summary: Gets the profile of the current authenticated user.
get.description:
The user is resolved from the external authentication identifier (for example, the
Firebase UID in the JWT `sub` claim). Clients do not need to provide an id or email.

delete.description:
The user to delete is determined from the caller's access token. This endpoint is
intended for self-service account removal scenarios.

put.summary: Updates the display name of the current authenticated user.
put.description:
The target user is derived from the access token. This endpoint cannot be used to
update another user's name; administrators should use the id-based endpoints instead.

CreateUserDto.description:
Request payload for creating a new user via the WebAPI.
            
The external authentication identifier is *not* supplied by the client; it is derived from
the authenticated principal's token claims (see M:WebAPI.Authorization.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetExternalAuthId(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)).

bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Paste only the JWT, without the 'Bearer ' prefix.
